item.title: How to debug iOS with local server
item.description: When you need to test interactions within your app that require a custom web page, such as engaging with payment options in a pop-up browser via universal links or deep links, the process might seem daunting at first. However, with the right approach, it becomes manageable and straightforward. Like in the screenshot below: Recently, I encountered a task that required testing payment interactions on a web page within a pop-up browser.
